comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: As near as I can figure, the fellow standing at the front of the group is Prince Petar Petrovic Njegos, who can also be seen at upper right in the photo on this page about the royal family of Montenegro. According to text farther down that page, Prince Petar lived from 1889 to 1932.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: It looks like you could be right. We will update the source data and reload the description. Thanks!
